EntryName	CETN2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Centrin-2 (Caltractin isoform 1)
GeneName	CETN2 CALT CEN2
Length	172
Function	Plays a fundamental role in microtubule organizing center structure and function. Required for centriole duplication and correct spindle formation. Has a role in regulating cytokinesis and genome stability via cooperation with CALM1 and CCP110.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton; Microtubule organizing center; Centrosome; Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton; Microtubule organizing center; Centrosome; Centriole; Nucleus envelope; Nucleus; Nuclear pore complex; Nucleus
